description: An old, ICW era Cybersun executive yacht turned salvage vessel. While the exterior of the vessels hull may lead most to believe of the Ifrit as a civilian vessel, instead what it harbors is an Exosuit-based team of wreckers within. While the design itself is dated and heavily modified, it still serves it's purpose as a one in a million similiar looking vessels, deflecting any attention from onlookers.
